Returns:

ZigZagLeft

public boolean zigZagLeft()
Makes the ZigZagRobot move forward one space and left one space. The robot remains facing the same direction. If the robot is unable to complete both moves it returns to the original position.

Returns:
true if the robot was able to zig zag left, false otherwise

ZigZagRight

public boolean zigZagRight()
Makes the ZigZagRobot move forward one space and right one space. The robot remains facing the same direction. If the robot is unable to complete both moves it returns to the original position.

Returns:
true if the robot was able to zig zag right, false otherwise
